meanings.definition: A small bus used to transport a small number of passengers.
meanings.sent1: The minibus picked up children from school every day.
meanings.sent2: We took a minibus to the beach for a day trip.
meanings.sent3: The minibus driver told jokes to entertain the passengers.
meanings.sent4: The minibus was a cheerful yellow bee buzzing along the road.
meanings.sent5: I'll never forget the bumpy ride on the minibus through the countryside.

meanings.definition: A minivan designed to carry more passengers than a typical car.
meanings.sent1: Our family decided to buy a minibus for our road trips.
meanings.sent2: The minibus had extra seats for all our friends to join us.
meanings.sent3: The minibus felt like a cozy living room on wheels.
meanings.sent4: The minibus was a reliable workhorse, carrying us through all kinds of weather.
meanings.sent5: The minibus became our go-to vehicle for group outings.
